#include<iostream>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
   int t;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   char c;
   c=getchar();
   while(t--)
   {
       char a[101];
       gets(a);
       for(int i=0;a[i];i++)
       {
           if(a[i]=='8'&&(a[i-1]==' '||i==0)&&(a[i+1]==' '||a[i+1]=='\0'))
           printf("ate");
           else if(a[i]=='8'&&(a[i-1]=='w')&&(a[i+1]==' '||a[i+1]=='\0')&&(a[i-2]==' '||i==1))
           printf("ait");
           else if(a[i]=='8'&&(a[i-1]=='r')&&(a[i+1]==' '||a[i+1]=='\0')&&(a[i-2]=='g'||i==1)&&(a[i-3]==' '||i==2))
           printf("eat");
           else if(a[i]=='4'&&(a[i-1]==' '||i==0)&&(a[i+1]==' '||a[i+1]=='\0'))
           printf("for");
           else if(a[i]=='4'&&(a[i-1]=='b')&&(a[i+1]==' '||a[i+1]=='\0')&&(a[i-2]==' '||i==1))
           printf("efore");
           else
           printf("%c",a[i]);
       }
       printf("\n");
   }        
   return 0;
}
